snippet.title: Glassbreakers Showcase | DevTalk: What is Glassbreakers?
snippet.description:
Play Glassbreakers for FREE on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/887330/Glassbreakers_Champions_of_Moss?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=steambeta&utm_medium=desc

Play Glassbreakers for FREE on App Lab! https://www.meta.com/experiences/9270732869663327/

Glassbreakers is a real-time battler inspired by the enchanting world of Moss and Moss: Book II, where players face off in intense 1v1 matches with their hand-selected squad of Champions. Each Champion possesses a unique set of special abilities, infusing each team with its own personality and strategy. The result? An endless variety of gameplay experiences and battle scenarios where only the sharpest Glassbreakers will reign victorious over their adversaries. 

👉 Learn More About Glassbreakers: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2RFPxVHHBwJesGqAWWR-pIsKx_PQXzaT

⚔️ Join the Glassbreakers community! ⚔️ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/glassbreakersgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/glassbreakersvr
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@glassbreakersgame
More: linktr.ee/glassbreakersgame

About Polyarc Studios:
After leaving Bungie in 2015, they struck out on their own, seizing the unmistakable opportunity to make an impact on the future of game development.
‍
Polyarc’s studio, located in the lively Capitol Hill neighborhood of Seattle, was formed not only to build groundbreaking player experiences, but also to champion a culture where deep collaboration, creative expression, and high player value are at the forefront of every innovation. Our team of accomplished developers continue to tackle the many challenges before us and we’re making great progress every day. We released Moss in 2018, but we’re not stopping there. We can’t wait to show you what we’re up to.

#Glassbreakers #vrgames  #virtualreality  #metaquest2  #quest3
